participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Reflective and sensitive, Emily often finds solace in her pet fish and enjoys the vibrancy of her favorite color, orange. She is navigating her emotions after a recent breakup, looking for support and understanding.
participant_1.background: i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

participant_2.name: Charlie
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, Charlie has a vivid imagination and enjoys simple pleasures like candy and singing. He expresses himself with enthusiasm despite some communication challenges.
participant_2.background: i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i am four years old.
